extension.summary: Tvheadend: a TV streaming server for Linux
extension.description: Tvheadend (ca756e3): is a TV streaming server for Linux supporting DVB-S/S2, DVB-C, DVB-T/T2, IPTV, SAT>IP, ATSC and ISDB-T
extension.summary: Tvheadend: un servidor de transmisión de TV para Linux
extension.description: Tvheadend (ca756e3): es un servidor de transmisión de TV para Linux compatible DVB-S/S2, DVB-C, DVB-T/T2, IPTV, SAT>IP, ATSC y ISDB-T
